chinese: 東門之池、可以漚麻。彼美淑姬、可與晤歌。
english: The moat at the east gate,Is fit to steep hemp in.That beautiful, virtuous, lady,Can respond to you in songs.

chinese: 東門之池、可以漚紵。彼美淑姬、可與晤語。
english: The moat at the east gate,Is fit to steep the boehmeria in.That beautiful, virtuous, lady,Can respond to you in discourse.

chinese: 東門之池、可以漚菅。彼美淑姬、可與晤言。
english: The moat at the east gate,Is fit to steep the rope-rush in.That beautiful, virtuous lady,Can respond to you in conversation.
